---

# 🟢 写邮件

撰写电子邮件可能是一项耗时的任务，特别是当你需要先阅读收到的邮件时。本节将涵盖了从简单的写邮件告诉老板你今天生病了，到更复杂场景的冷邮件（Cold Emails）的各种用例。

## 病假

想象一下，有一天你生病了，不能去上班（或者只是不想去😈）。这里有一个简单的提示，可以写一封电子邮件给你的老板，告诉他们你病了。

<iframe
    src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?config=eyJ0b3BQIjowLCJ0ZW1wZXJhdHVyZSI6MCwibWF4VG9rZW5zIjoyNTYsIm91dHB1dCI6IuS6sueIseeahOWHr%2BWwlOW4jO%2B8mlxcblxcbuaIkeaYr%2BWFi%2Ba0m%2BS4ne%2B8jOaIkeaYr%2BS9oOeahOWRmOW3peOAguaIkeW%2BiOaKseatieWcsOmAmuefpeS9oO%2B8jOaIkeS7iuWkqeWboOS4uueUn%2BeXheS4jeiDveS4iuePreOAglxcblxcbuaIkeaYqOaZmuaEn%2BinieS4jeiIkuacje%2B8jOS7iuWkqeaXqeS4iuaIkeWOu%2Beci%2BS6huWMu%2BeUn%2B%2B8jOS7luiviuaWreaIkeW%2Bl%2BS6huaEn%2BWGkuOAguS7luW7uuiuruaIkeS8keaBr%2BWHoOWkqe%2B8jOaJgOS7peaIkeS4jeiDveS4iuePreOAglxuXG7miJHkvJrlsL3lv6vmgaLlpI3lgaXlurfvvIzlubblsL3lv6vlm57liLDlt6XkvZzlspfkvY3jgILlpoLmnpzkvaDpnIDopoHku7vkvZXlhbbku5bkv6Hmga%2FvvIzor7fpmo%2Fml7bogZTns7vmiJHjgIJcblxu6LCi6LCi77yBXG5cbuWFi%2Ba0m%2BS4nSIsInByb21wdCI6IuaIkeeahOWQjeWtl%2B%2B8muWFi%2Ba0m%2BS4nVxu6ICB5p2%2F55qE5ZCN5a2X77ya5Yev5bCU5biMXG5cbuWGmeS4gOWwgeeUteWtkOmCruS7tue7meaIkeeahOiAgeadv%2B%2B8jOWRiuivieS7luaIkeS7iuWkqeWboOS4uueUn%2BeXheS4jeiDveS4iuePreOAgiIsIm1vZGVsIjoidGV4dC1kYXZpbmNpLTAwMyJ9"
    style={{width:"100%", height:"500px", border:"0", borderRadius:"4px", overflow:"hidden"}}
    sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

这封电子邮件虽然没什么问题，但有点无聊。让我们加点料吧！

## 语言风格修改/指令

很容易就可以修改邮件的风格。例如，你可以要求 AI “幽默”，或指示它“包含一个有趣的理由”。

<iframe
    src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?config=eyJtb2RlbCI6InRleHQtZGF2aW5jaS0wMDMiLCJwcm9tcHQiOiLmiJHnmoTlkI3lrZfvvJrlhYvmtJvkuJ1cbuiAgeadv%2BeahOWQjeWtl%2B%2B8muWHr%2BWwlOW4jFxuXG7lhpnkuIDlsIHnlLXlrZDpgq7ku7bnu5nmiJHnmoTogIHmnb%2FvvIzlkYror4nku5bmiJHku4rlpKnlm6DkuLrnlJ%2Fnl4XkuI3og73kuIrnj63jgIJcbuivt%2BeugOa0geW5vem7mO%2B8jOWMheWQq%2BS4gOS4quaciei2o%2BeahOeQhueUse%2B8miIsIm91dHB1dCI6IuS6sueIseeahOWHr%2BWwlOW4jO%2B8mlxuXG7lvojpgZfmhr7vvIzmiJHku4rlpKnkuI3og73mnaXkuIrnj63jgILljp%2Flm6DmmK%2FmiJHmmKjmmZrlnKjlpJbpnaLlgZrlrozkuIDkuKrku7vliqHvvIznu5Pmnpzlm57liLDlrrblkI7lj5HnjrDlj5jmiJDkuobkuIDlj6rnjKvvvIHov5nlj6%2Fog73mmK%2FkuIDnp43lj6TogIHnmoTprZTms5XvvIzkvYblj6%2FmgJXnmoTmmK%2FlroPkvJrorqnmiJHmhJ%2FlhpLvvIzmiYDku6XmiJHlv4XpobvkvJHmga%2FkuIDlpKnmiY3og73mgaLlpI3lgaXlurfjgIJcblxu5oiR5Lya5bC95b%2Br5a6M5oiQ5oiR55qE5bel5L2c77yM5bm25bC95Yqb6LW25LiK5pe26Ze06KGo44CC56Wd5L2g5LuK5aSp5LiA5YiH6aG65Yip77yBXG5cbuacgOecn%2BivmueahOmXruWAme%2B8jFxuXG7lhYvmtJvkuJ0iLCJtYXhUb2tlbnMiOjUxMiwiYm94Um93cyI6MTAsInRlbXBlcmF0dXJlIjowLjcsInRvcFAiOjF9"

    sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>
<br/>

这里是另一个更加严肃/专业的示例。

<br/>

## 回复邮件

想象一下，你收到了老板一封很长的电子邮件，内容很多。你需要回复这封邮件，但是没有时间阅读整个邮件。这时你就可以将邮件内容交给 AI，并要求它`生成摘要和任务项清单`（译注：中文场景由于邮件格式问题，加上写信人和收信人效果会更好）。

<iframe
    src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?config=eyJtb2RlbCI6InRleHQtZGF2aW5jaS0wMDMiLCJwcm9tcHQiOiLlsIrmlaznmoTlhYvmtJvkuJ3vvIxcblxu5biM5pyb5L2g5LiA5YiH6YO95aW944CC5oiR5YaZ5L%2Bh57uZ5L2g77yM5ZCR5L2g5o%2BQ5L6b5oiR5Lus5YWs5Y%2B455qE5LiA5Lqb5paw5raI5oGv77yM5bm26K%2B35rGC5L2g5Y2P5Yqp6Kej5Yaz5L2g5omA5byA5Y%2BR55qE6L2v5Lu255qE55So5oi355WM6Z2iKFVJKemXrumimOOAglxuXG7mraPlpoLkvaDmiYDnn6XvvIzmiJHku6zlhazlj7jkuIDnm7Toh7Tlipvkuo7kuLrlrqLmiLfmj5DkvpvnlKjmiLflj4vlpb3nmoTkvZPpqozvvIzmiJHku6zlt7Lnu4%2Fnoa7lrprkuobova%2Fku7ZVSeaWuemdoueahOS4gOS6m%2BmXrumimOOAguWFt%2BS9k%2BadpeivtO%2B8jOaIkeS7rOaUtuWIsOS6hueUqOaIt%2BeahOWPjemmiO%2B8jOS7luS7rOWPkeeOsOiuv%2BmXruafkOS6m%2BWKn%2BiDveW%2BiOWbsOmavu%2B8jOW5tuS4lFVJ5LiN5aSf55u06KeC44CCXG5cbuaIkeS7rOmcgOimgeS9oOeahOW4ruWKqeadpeino%2BWGs%2Bi%2FmeS6m%2BmXrumimOW5tuaUueWWhOi9r%2BS7tueahFVJ44CC6L%2BZ5Y%2Bv6IO95raJ5Y%2BK5a%2B5VUnnmoTluIPlsYDjgIHorr7orqHmiJblip%2Fog73ov5vooYzmm7TmlLnjgILmiJHku6znm7jkv6HvvIzkvaDlnKjova%2Fku7blvIDlj5HmlrnpnaLnmoTkuJPkuJrnn6Xor4blkozlr7nova%2Fku7bnmoTnhp%2FmgonlsIbkvb%2FkvaDmiJDkuLrluK7liqnmiJHku6zlrozmiJDov5npobnku7vliqHnmoTnkIbmg7PkurrpgInjgIJcblxu5aaC5p6c5L2g6ZyA6KaB5Lu75L2V6aKd5aSW55qE6LWE5rqQ5oiW5pSv5oyB5p2l5a6M5oiQ6L%2BZ6aG55Lu75Yqh77yM6K%2B35LiN6KaB54q56LGr5ZGK6K%2BJ5oiR44CC5q2k5aSW77yM5aaC5p6c5L2g6IO95aSf5o%2BQ5L6b5LiA5Liq6aKE6K6h5L%2Bu5pS55a6M5oiQ5pe26Ze055qE5Lyw6K6h77yM5oiR5Lya6Z2e5bi45oSf5r%2BA44CCXG5cbuWmguaenOS9oOacieS7u%2BS9lemXrumimOaIlumcgOimgei%2Fm%2BS4gOatpeeahOa%2BhOa4he%2B8jOivt%2BS4jeimgeeKueixq%2BiBlOezu%2BaIkeOAglxuXG7mhJ%2FosKLkvaDlr7nmiJHku6zlhazlj7jnmoTovpvli6Tlt6XkvZzlkozlpYnnjK7jgILmiJHmnJ%2FlvoXnnYDlvojlv6vmlLbliLDkvaDnmoTlm57lpI3jgIJcblxu5q2k6Ie0XG5cbuaVrOekvFxuXG7lh6%2FlsJTluIxcblxu55Sf5oiQ5Lul5LiK5YaF5a655pGY6KaB5ZKM5Lu75Yqh6aG55riF5Y2V44CCIiwib3V0cHV0Ijoi5YaZ5L%2Bh5Lq677ya5Yev5bCU5biMXG7mlLbkv6HkurrvvJrlhYvmtJvkuJ1cblxu5YaF5a655pGY6KaB77ya5Yev5bCU5biM5ZCR5YWL5rSb5Lid5o%2BQ5L6b5LqG5YWs5Y%2B455qE5LiA5Lqb5paw5raI5oGv77yM5bm26K%2B35rGC5YWL5rSb5Lid5Y2P5Yqp6Kej5Yaz6L2v5Lu255qE55So5oi355W     sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

<br/>
你可以使用这份摘要来撰写回复邮件。

<iframe
    src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?config=eyJtb2RlbCI6InRleHQtZGF2aW5jaS0wMDMiLCJwcm9tcHQiOiLlhpnkv6HkurrvvJrlh6%2FlsJTluIxcbuaUtuS%2FoeS6uu%2B8muWFi%2Ba0m%2BS4nVxuXG7lhoXlrrnmkZjopoHvvJrlh6%2FlsJTluIzlkJHlhYvmtJvkuJ3mj5Dkvpvkuoblhazlj7jnmoTkuIDkupvmlrDmtojmga%2FvvIzlubbor7fmsYLlhYvmtJvkuJ3ljY%2Fliqnop6PlhrPova%2Fku7bnmoTnlKjmiLfnlYzpnaLpl67popjjgIJcblxu5Lu75Yqh6aG55riF5Y2V77yaXG4xLiDlr7lVSeeahOW4g%2BWxgOOAgeiuvuiuoeaIluWKn%2BiDvei%2Fm%2BihjOabtOaUueOAglxuMi4g5o%2BQ5L6b5LiA5Liq6aKE6K6h5L%2Bu5pS55a6M5oiQ5pe26Ze055qE5Lyw6K6h44CCXG4zLiDlpoLmnpzpnIDopoHvvIzmj5Dkvpvpop3lpJbnmoTotYTmupDmiJbmlK%2FmjIHjgIJcblxu6K%2B35qC55o2u5Lul5LiK55S15a2Q6YKu5Lu25pGY6KaB77yM5pKw5YaZ5LiA5bCB57uZ5Yev5bCU5biM55qE5Zue5aSN6YKu5Lu277yaIiwib3V0cHV0Ijoi5Lqy54ix55qE5Yev5bCU5biM77yaXG5cbuaEn%2BiwouaCqOe7meaIkeWPkemAgeWFs%2BS6juWFrOWPuOeahOaWsOa2iOaBr%2BOAguaIkeW%2BiOS5kOaEj%2BWNj%2BWKqeino%2BWGs%2Bi9r%2BS7tueahOeUqOaIt%2BeVjOmdoumXrumimOOAglxuXG7miJHlsIblsL3lv6vlr7lVSeeahOW4g%2BWxgOOAgeiuvuiuoeaIluWKn%2BiDvei%2Fm%2BihjOabtOaUue%2B8jOW5tuWwveWKm%2BWcqOacgOefreeahOaXtumXtOWGheWujOaIkOOAguWmguaenOmcgOimge%2B8jOaIkeWPr%2BS7peaPkOS%2Bm%2BmineWklueahOi1hOa6kOaIluaUr%2BaMgeOAglxuXG7mnJ%2FlvoXnnYDkuI7mgqjnmoTlkIjkvZzvvIFcblxu5YWL5rSb5LidIiwibWF4VG9rZW5zIjoxMDI0LCJib3hSb3dzIjoxOCwidGVtcGVyYXR1cmUiOjAsInRvcFAiOjB9"
    style={{width:"100%", height:"900px", border:"0", borderRadius:"4px", overflow:"hidden"}}
    sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

<br/>
请注意，你通常可以将这两个步骤合并为一个。你可以要求 AI 直接从你收到的电子邮件中生成一个回复邮件。

## 冷邮件（Cold Emails）

冷邮件是发给陌生人的电子邮件。由于很难从冷邮件中获得回复，因此发送定制性较高的邮件可能会有所更有效。让我们看看如何使用 GPT-3(@bonta2022how) 来实现这一点。

<iframe
    src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?config=eyJtb2RlbCI6InRleHQtZGF2aW5jaS0wMDMiLCJwcm9tcHQiOiLlhazlj7jlkI06IOe9l%2BW%2Bt%2BWym1xu5oiR55qE5ZCN5a2XOiDlhYvmtJvkuJ1cbuaSsOWGmeS4gOWwgeWGt%2BmCruS7tiIsIm91dHB1dCI6IuWwiuaVrOeahOWFi%2Ba0m%2BS4ne%2B8mlxuXG7mgqjlpb3vvIFcblxu5oiR5piv572X5b635bKb55qE5oub6IGY5LiT5ZGY77yM5b6I6auY5YW06IO95aSf5LiO5oKo6IGU57O744CCXG5cbuaIkeS7rOato%2BWcqOWvu%2BaJvuS4gOS9jeacieiDveWKm%2BOAgeacieeDreaDheeahOS4k%2BS4muS6uuWjq%2BWKoOWFpeaIkeS7rOeahOWboumYn%2B%2B8jOS7peaUr%2BaMgeaIkeS7rOeahOS4muWKoeWPkeWxleOAguaIkeS7rOato%2BWcqOWvu%2BaJvuS4gOS9jeacieiDveWKm%2BOAgeacieeDreaDheeahOS4k%2BS4muS6uuWjq%2BWKoOWFpeaIkeS7rOeahOWboumYn%2B%2B8jOS7peaUr%2BaMgeaIkeS7rOeahOS4muWKoeWPkeWxleOAglxuXG7miJHku6zmraPlnKjmi5vogZjkuIDkvY3ogYzkvY3vvIzmgqjlj6%2Fog73mnInlhbTotqPjgILor6XogYzkvY3opoHmsYLmnInoia%2Flpb3nmoTmsp%2FpgJrog73lipvjgIHnu4Tnu4fog73lipvlkozliIbmnpDog73lipvvvIzku6Xlj4rkuI7lrqLmiLflu7rnq4voia%2Flpb3nmoTlhbPns7vjgIJcblxu5aaC5p6c5oKo5pyJ5YW06Laj77yM6K%2B35Y%2BR6YCB5oKo55qE566A5Y6G5ZKM5rGC6IGM5L%2Bh6Iez5oiR5Lus55qE55S15a2Q6YKu566x77yM5oiR5Lus5bCG5bC95b%2Br5LiO5oKo6IGU57O744CCXG5cbuacn%2BW%2BheaCqOeahOWbnuWkje%2B8gVxuXG7npZ3lpb3vvIxcbue9l%2BW%2Bt%2BWymyIsIm1heFRva2VucyI6MTAyNCwiYm94Um93cyI6MTAsInRlbXBlcmF0dXJlIjowLCJ0b3BQIjowfQ%3D%3D"
    style={{width:"100%", height:"500px", border:"0", borderRadius:"4px", overflow:"hidden"}}
    sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

效果还可以，但是我们可以做的更好。让我们添加一些更多的信息到提示中。

### 使用非结构化信息

假设你已经拥有了你要发送邮件的收件人的 LinkedIn 账户，你可以将这些信息添加到邮件中，使邮件更具个性化。我们以 [Strive 的创始人](https://www.linkedin.com/in/snpranav/) 的 LinkedIn 账户为例子，从他的资料中复制一些信息并添加到邮件中。（译注：此处使用了完整的 LinkedIn 主页内容，翻译成中文后会超长，故保持原文。大概效果就是 GPT 会使用提供的信息，编写看起来是“量身定制”的邮件）

<iframe
    src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%%"
    style={{width:"100%", height:"1950px", border:"0", borderRadius:"4px", overflow:"hidden"}}
    sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

LLMs 非常有用，可以减少我们从 LinkedIn 复制的所有信息的混乱程度。通过从 LinkedIn 上抓取相关信息，这种冷启动过程也可以在更大范围内实现自动化。




## 总结

LLMs 可以帮助你撰写电子邮件！但在发送之前，请务必阅读他们所写的内容 😉


## 更多参考

- [Zapier](https://zapier.com/blog/use-openai-gpt-3-to-write-emails/)
